title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Each criterion is achieved independently.
descriptions: Response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.

Response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the requirement of “describe” in parts (a) and (b), the response must offer a minimally accurate description of a continuity or change.

Response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the requirement of “describe” in parts (a) and (b), the response must offer a minimally accurate description of a continuity or change.

Response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the requirement of “describe” in parts (a) and (b), the response must offer a minimally accurate description of a continuity or change.
